meanings.definition: Buy back something that one has previously sold.
meanings.sent1: She repurchased her old car after regretting selling it.
meanings.sent2: The company repurchased the shares from the investor.
meanings.sent3: After realizing the mistake, he quickly repurchased the antique vase.
meanings.sent4: The bookstore repurchased the used textbooks for a higher price.
meanings.sent5: The farmer repurchased the land to expand his crops.

meanings.definition: Purchase something that one has previously owned.
meanings.sent1: He repurchased his childhood home to relive old memories.
meanings.sent2: The collector repurchased the rare coin for his collection.
meanings.sent3: She repurchased her favorite childhood toy for nostalgia.
meanings.sent4: The artist repurchased his first painting to showcase his progress.
meanings.sent5: The family repurchased their old furniture for sentimental reasons.
